title: Jer's Blog——Life is now
subTitle: 逍遥青山外，亦闻尘世风。
indexStyle: body {background-color: #f0f0f0;font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;}header {background-color: #333;color: white;padding: 10px;text-align: center;}nav {margin: 15px 0;background-color: #ddd;}nav ul {padding: 0;list-style-type: none;}nav ul li {display: inline;margin-right: 10px;}nav ul li a {text-decoration: none;color: black;background-color: #bbb;padding: 5px 10px;}nav ul li a:hover {background-color: #999;}main {margin: 15px 0;padding: 20px;background-color: #fff;}footer {text-align: center;padding: 10px;background-color: #333;color: white;}
